org.giiwa.web

类 Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.giiwa.web.Controller
  • 直接已知子类:
    accesslog, app, backup, browserinfo, captcha, counter, dashboard, database, dfile, f, file, footprint, i18n, index, index, logs, menu, module, monitor, node, portlet, profile, repo, role, setting, setup, sysinfo, syslog, sysstat, system, task, temp, token, upload, user, user

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    the Controller Class is base controller, all class that provides web api should inherit it
    it provides api mapping, path/method mapping, contains all the parameters from the request, and contains all key/value will be pass to view.
    it wrap all parameter in head, or get method.
    the most important method: 
     get(String name), get the value of parameter in request, it will convert HTML tag to "special" tag, to avoid destroy;
 getHtml(String name), get the value of the parameter in request as original HTML format;
 head(String name),get the value from header;
 file(String name),get the File value from the request;
 set(String, Object), set the key/value back to view;
    作者:
    yjiang

      限定符和类型 类和说明

      the NameValue Class used to contain the name and value

      • sid

        public final java.lang.String sid(boolean newSession)
        get the current session, the sequence of session from request: 
         sid=? in cookie
 sid=? in header
 token=? in query
 sid=? in query
        .
        参数:
        newSession - if true and not presented, create a new one, otherwise return null
        返回:
        the string

        public int getInt(java.lang.String name,
                  int defaultValue,
                  java.lang.String tagInSession)
        已过时。 
        Gets the int from the request parameter, if the tag is not presented, then get the value from the session, if the value less than minvalue, then get the minvalue, and store the value in session
        参数:
        name - the name
        defaultValue - the default value
        tagInSession - the tag in session
        返回:
        the int

        public void error(java.lang.Throwable e)
        Show error page to end user.
        if the request is AJAX, then response a json with error back to front
        参数:
        e - the throwable

      • notfound

        public void notfound()
        已过时。 
        default notfound handler
        1) look for "/notfound" model, if found, dispatch to it.
        2) else response notfound page or json to front-end according the request type

      • notfound

        public void notfound(java.lang.String message)
        show notfound with message
        参数:
        message -

      • isAjax

        public boolean isAjax()
        test the request is Ajax ?
        X-Request-With:XMLHttpRequest
        Content-Type: application/json
        output: json
        返回:
        true: yes
